articles.description: Pubg Mobile Runic Power update 1.2 patch notes have been unveiled by the developers. Update 1.2 is going to roll out on January 12th.
articles.content: Pubg Mobile Runic Power update 1.2 patch notes have been unveiled by the developers. Update 1.2 is going to roll out on January 12th. The game will have a new Runic Power mode with special powers. Th… [+1667 chars]
